sentences.en: " Bears , dragons , tempestuous on mountain and river , Startle t he forest and make the heights tremble . "
sentences.cn: 熊 咆 龙吟殷岩泉, 栗深林兮惊层巅.

sentences.en: Antidepressant medication will lower anxiety and reduce sleep disturbances, startle reactions, difficulty in returning to function.
sentences.cn: 抗抑郁症药物能够缓解焦虑、减轻睡眠干扰 、 惊厥反应以及功能恢复障碍等.

sentences.en: I didn't mean to startle you by driving like that.
sentences.cn: 我这样开车不是想吓你的.

sentences.en: I didn't mean to startle you.
Sorry, I didn't mean to startle you.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我不是故意想吓你一跳的。

sentences.en: Sorry, I didn’t mean to startle you.
sentences.cn: 抱歉，我不是故意吓你一跳的。

sentences.en: Terrors startle him on every side and dog his every step.
sentences.cn: 11四面的惊吓要使他害怕,并且追赶他的脚跟.

sentences.en: The above story provided the idiom grass and startle snake.
sentences.cn: 由此产生了“打草惊蛇”这个成语.

sentences.en: The least noise would startle the timid child.
sentences.cn: 最小的响声也会吓着这个胆小的孩子的.

sentences.en: The man was awaken with a startle.
sentences.cn: 由于受到惊吓,他醒了过来.

sentences.en: The news will startle the City.
sentences.cn: 这个消息会让伦敦商业区的人们大吃一惊。

sentences.en: They have nightmares, they startle easily.
sentences.cn: 他们做噩梦，经常从梦中惊醒。

sentences.en: When some chinese idioms are tramslated into English, Their meanings may startle some English readers.
sentences.cn: 一些汉语成语被翻译长英语后, 会使一些英语读者感到很吃惊.

sentences.en: Would he startle him with sudden fear?
sentences.cn: 他要让牧师因突来的恐惧而大惊失色 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: to make someone suddenly surprised or slightly shocked

trans.tran_cn: 使震惊，使大吃一惊，使惊跳，使惊吓
trans.tran_en: to make someone suddenly surprised or slightly shocked
